requirements.summary: Update the APP_NAME constant in branding.ts to 'TickTockTask'
acceptanceCriteria: The APP_NAME constant in frontend/src/branding.ts is set to 'TickTockTask'.
All UI locations that reference APP_NAME display 'TickTockTask'.
The browser tab title (index.html or derived from APP_NAME) reflects 'TickTockTask'.

file_operations.description: Change the APP_NAME constant from its current value ('TickTaskTime') to 'TickTockTask'. This single change will propagate the new name throughout the application wherever APP_NAME is referenced.
